extendedInfo.description: Chore Checklist helps you to manage chores at home or other places. It records chores' completion date and calculate next due date based on your preference. You can also set reminder for each chore.It comes with a pre-loaded check list which has routines, such as "Daily Routine", "Weekly Routine", "Monthly Routine" and etc. You may edit them or add new routine/chores.Since version 2.0, users are allowed to create multiple lists. In full version, user can use widget view as a dashboard to combine multiple lists in one view. There are also statistics reports to record chore completion history. With separate purchase of Chore Checklist Cloud Connector, the full version users can also sync/backup to cloud and share their lists with other users. We also provide free online editor at www.dotnetideas.com for easy list editing.***It will not be efficient if you only leave comment in Google Play when you have issues using this app. The best way to solve them is to contact us directly. It will not only help you, but also help other users. We answer every user's email within one business day. Please also feel free to try out our paid version. We always give full refund if you are not happy with our apps.***Previous release notes:5/27/2011 V1.4.8Fix date parsing issue for non-English localeFix issue with alarms when there are more than one daily routinesAllow moving to SD card (NOTE: if you choose to move to SD card, you will not be able to use widgets. If later you changed your mind, you will have to uninstall and reinstall the app)Other minor bug fixes5/31/2011 V1.4.9Improve performance when check off a choreFix bug in checking off all chores in a routineAllow customizing text size in widget10/11/2011 V1.5.0Change the global setting of due date calculation to chore level and make it available in free version tooMinor bug fixesPaid version only:Add new widget view to allow user quickly check off choresAdd timer in widget viewAdd more font size Add 4x3 widgetAllow user to choose translucent colorAllow user to set the auto reset time10/17/2011 V1.5.1Fix V1.5.0 running slow and "Force Close" issuePaid version only:Add 4x4 widgetAdd new options to show/hide completion dateAllow changing due date and completion date color11/15/2011 V1.5.2Make the chores easier to be checked/uncheckedBug fixPaid version only:Add option to show/hide due dateAdd option to not prompt for completion dateAdd option to show/hide completed choresAdd option to change the color of checked chores1/18/2012 V1.5.3Fix bug with resetting checkbox when a chore is finished after the due dateAutomatically restart reminders after rebooting deviceAdd "+" button on routine for quick inserting of new choreAdd location to chores Other bug fixesPaid version only:Add date separator bar in widget viewAllow user to choose whether they want to press the chore text to check/uncheck a chore (some users had difficult time scrolling the list because it keeps check off chores)3/12/2012 V2.0.0Allow multiple listsAdd color indicator when a chore is skipped 2+ timesFull version only:Statistics reportsAllow user to customize notification colorAllow user to use widget view as default view to display multiple listsSync/backup list to server*Share lists between users**Separate purchase of ChoreChecklistCloudConnector is required for these two features.3/30/2012 V2.0.2Fix FC bugs when open the app5/9/2012 V2.0.5Fix list renaming issueFix routine fail to expand issue9/10/2012 V2.0.6Fix select multiple lists for widget view issueFix select multiple lists for reminder issue1/28/2013 V2.0.8Fix date picker title display issue in Android OS 4.0+Add "Delete Completed One-time Chores" optionAllow copy/paste choresAdd more font size options for widgetOther minor bug fixes02/08/2013 - Version 2.0.9Fix date picker title display issue in Android OS 4.0+(again)Other minor bug fixes

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Able to add chores.
reviews.author: Dawn Alizoti

reviews.title: Force closes after last update
reviews.comment: I love the app but after the last update it keeps getting and forces chooses every time I try to use it
reviews.author: brittany depalma-yahn

reviews.title: I like this app
reviews.comment: It is so usefull fir me for the first time I did ol my chores!!!!!!! I would give it a 5 put it closes some times!!!!
reviews.author: Madelyn Alexandra Palacios Bernardo

reviews.title: Galaxy S2
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app, functionality is awesome, convenient, efficient and helps one to really organise themselves. Perfect :)
reviews.author: Aisha Ismail

reviews.title: This was exactly what I needed!
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for almost 2 months now on my galaxy s2 and it works great. Keeps me on track, my house has never been so clean! Thanks.
reviews.author: Rachel Weinmann

reviews.title: incompatible with my phone
reviews.comment: Why oh why do developers keep releasing \"lite\" or \"trial\" versions of apps and then I find that the full version is incompatible with my phone. Grrrr. Could have been good, but I\'ll never know now :(
reviews.author: Hilly Bouteloup

reviews.title: Great Motivator
reviews.comment: I have a Thunderbolt, it works great. I have made additional time frames, with additional chores for the times. I love to check the chores off daily, they reset each new day, so you can get back to work.
reviews.author: Linda Brixon

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.comment: I love this app! I use it daily to keep track of to do lists. It also keeps me on track for weekly house cleaning. I really like the progress bar for a chore you are working on but have yet to complete. I plan to purchase to full version soon. Thank you!
reviews.author: Crystal M

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Use this with my kidz and myself, love the reminder, just wish it had a place to put our names visibly instead of looking in the edit screen.
reviews.author: Jacob Halbert

reviews.title: Good but very expensive
reviews.comment: It has full version and cloud connector sold separately.  It should be changed
reviews.author: Ravi Teja

reviews.title: Great.  Use it every day.  Recommended.
reviews.comment: Just perfect for organising my cleaning plan & daily to do\'s.  A great basic system that is easy to customise.
reviews.author: Rachael Clements

reviews.comment: My favourite app makes it easy for me to follow  a time table
reviews.author: himanshu kochhar

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Wish there was a way to assign chores to specific people.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Reminder
reviews.comment: Keeps me on my toes
reviews.author: James Nelson

reviews.title: Great App.
reviews.comment: Keeps me in focus, on track.
reviews.author: Rosah Kleyn-Schoen

reviews.comment: Nice app
reviews.author: vijay kashyap

reviews.title: More options plz
reviews.comment: A nice handy app,but would prefer it if would be a little more personalized so can check off room by room( in 1 day) rather then have a overall full list-the everyday list should have more options like what to do room by room
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
reviews.comment: Tried probably 20 some chore/routine apps, this comes up my favorite. I am very detailed & others are just too simple and don\'t do enough for me.  Plan on buying full version soon.  Very surprised to find my schedule still there when I switched phones, since I thought that was a full version feature. Very minimal widget, (suggest taskos,but it has it\'s problems with me) Also would love a \"sort by\" button that you can personalize. Since I have kids & sort chores by room and \"loud\", \"quite\" while they nap.
reviews.author: Jozie Mader

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Lost without it.
reviews.author: Amber Turnpaugh

reviews.title: Couldn\'t have designed it better myself!
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this app. It was exactly what I have been looking for.  I love that you can set it to show your next due date for a task based on the completion date.  The ONLY reason that I didn\'t give this five stars is because I wish there was an option to sort tasks by room.  You can drag them around and put them in the order you want them it, but I think it would be awesome if you could just click \"show living room tasks\" and then you could tackle the lists room by room.  Other than that, excellent job!
reviews.author: Ruth Rupnik
